MAN.TITLE: CLKIN_f
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Scicos Super Block event input port

DESCRIPTION.P: This block must only be used inside Scicos Super Blocks to represent an event input port.
In a Super Block, the event input ports must be numbered from 1 to the number of event input ports.

ITEMIZE.label: DIALOGUE PARAMETERS
ITEMIZE.ITEM: : an integer defining the port number.
